name: Nytro
description:
Nytro is an in-development exploration and collectible-focused 3D platformer game inspired by the original Spyro trilogy. Charge, jump, glide, and swim around colorful worlds, collecting bolts and golden gears to unlock new worlds to explore!

Available now is the game's first hub world. More levels will be added as they are finished. When the game is finished and ready for launch, the free demo will contain a few levels, with the full version available for purchase.

Discord  |  Press kit


Controls

Movement - WASD / left analog stick
Camera - mouse / right analog stick / left and right trigger (L2 and R2)
Charge - shift / right mouse button / left face button / left bumper (L1)
Jump - space / bottom face button / right stick button (R3)
Glide - Press jump while in the air
Glide jump - Press jump while gliding
Zap attack - e / left mouse button / right face button / right bumper (R1)

Pause - escape / right special button / pause
Show totals - tab / left special button / back (select)

Swimming Surface

Movement - WASD / left analog stick
Jump - space / bottom face button / right stick button (R3)
Dive - shift / right mouse button / left face button / left bumper (L1)

Underwater

Rotation - WASD / left analog stick
Swim - space / bottom face button / right stick button (R3)
Charge - shift / right mouse button / left face button / left bumper (L1)

Debug

Toggle cursor lock - P
Toggle camera look - M
Toggle both cursor lock and camera look - L
Hide player - left control + H
Take supersized screenshot (placed in game directory) - F2


Known issues
  • On Linux, the game may need permission to be executed. This is a checkbox in the executable files' properties.
